name: Chana Masala
description: Chickpeas cooked in a tangy tomato-onion gravy with warming spices.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Grilled paneer cubes marinated in yogurt, chili, and spices; served with mint chutney.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Roasted chicken in a creamy tomato sauce with garam masala and butter.

name: Masala Dosa
description: Crispy rice-lentil crepe filled with spiced potatoes; served with sambar and chutneys.

name: Vegetable Biryani
description: Basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables, saffron, and aromatic whole spices.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Milk-solid dumplings soaked in rose-cardamom syrup.

name: Onion Pakora
description: Crispy onion fritters in chickpea batter; a classic Indian appetizer served with mint chutney.

name: Vegetable Samosa
description: Golden fried pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas; served with tamarind chutney.

name: paneer koorma
description: paneer which is cruched into pieces and made into a gravy

name: chicken biryani
description: chicken pieces cooked over basmati rice
